fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment
eu_initiatives: Participation in the European Statistical System, in Eurostat and EU commisson activivites related to statistics and social science.
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
goals__remit: Statistics Norway has overall responsibility for official statistics in Norway, and carries out extensive research and analysis activities. New statistics and analyses are published on a daily basis on ssb.no.
relevant_communication: Best source of information is ssb.no
